name: GreenWay Infrastructure s.r.o.
goal: GreenWay is devoted to make use of electric vehicles the realistic and preferred transportation option for all people. We build and manage electric vehicle charging infrastructure throughout Central and Eastern Europe and work with people, companies, organizations and governments to develop and expand the electromobility ecosystem. We are making GreenWay the largest charging service provider in CEE. We are committed providing exceptional customer experience in everything what we do. Doing so, we will contribute to widespread adoption of EV in our region and fulfillment of our Vision: Central & Eastern Europe cleaner, healthier, less dependent on oil thanks to the widespread us of electric vehicles.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Following the Directive 2014/94/EU on the deployment of alternative fuels infrastructure.
